channel.title: WebApps on Pwny_Sec
channel.description: Recent content in WebApps on Pwny_Sec

item.title: SqlMap
item.description: SqlMap automates finding sql-injection it can use GET or POST request. It’s pretty neat. In burp right click select copy to file, this will test for sql injection. pretty cool wasn’t aware it would test all the parameters. sqlmap –batch -r login.req sqlmap --batch -u "http://os.htb/users/admin*" --level 5 --risk 3 -u url also for get request --batch run default yes --* = the parameter to fuzz --dump , --dump-all dumping sqldb to a localfile in /
